response.overview: A unique cinematic experience that invites audiences on a vibrant journey through the life of cultural icon Pharrell Williams. Told through the lens of LEGO® animation, turn up the volume on your imagination and witness the evolution of one of music's most innovative minds.
response.tagline: Turn up the volume on your imagination.
response.title: Piece by Piece

titles.title: Peça por Peça: Uma História de Pharrell Williams
ファレル・ウィリアムス：ピース・バイ・ピース
